sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useCombat } from '../../hooks/useCombat'; import './CombatPanel.css'; import CombatLog from './CombatLog'; /** * CombatPanel component - Handles combat UI and interactions */ const CombatPanel: React.FC = () => { const { enemies, currentEnemy, isFighting, playerStats, combatLog, startCombat, fleeCombat } = useCombat(); // Handle enemy selection const handleSelectEnemy = (enemyId: string) => { if (isFighting) return; // Prevent changing enemy during combat startCombat(enemyId); }; // Handle fleeing from combat const handleFlee = () => { fleeCombat(); }; return (

Combat

Choose an Enemy

{enemies.map(enemy => (
handleSelectEnemy(enemy.id)} >

{enemy.name}

ATK: {enemy.attack} DEF: {enemy.defense} HP: {enemy.maxHealth}
))}

Combat Status

{currentEnemy ? (

Fighting: {currentEnemy.name}

{currentEnemy.health} / {currentEnemy.maxHealth}
{Math.floor(playerStats.health)} / {playerStats.maxHealth}

Your Combat Stats

Attack: {playerStats.attack}
Strength: {playerStats.strength}
Defense: {playerStats.defense}

Combat is automatic. Your character will attack every 2 seconds.

Successfully landing hits will earn you Combat XP.

) : (

Select an enemy from the list to begin combat.

)}

Combat Log

); }; export default CombatPanel;
